author: jeffyu
msg: * remove @override to make it compile successfully with JDK5.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2899: maxMessagesPerPoll is applied eagerly for the file/ftp components to avoid excessive memory consumption when polling directories with 100.000 or more files.

author: rhuijben
msg: Disable 'guessed' UAC prompts on Windows Vista and 7 for our application
by enabling a UAC marker in the manifes, specifying that our applications
should always run with the same permissions as the invocating program
(unless specifically overridden via RunAs), to make sure Windows
doesn't guess that we want to do administrative tasks.

author: thobbs
msg: NewTaskManager: branch to test new implementations of TaskManager
